titles.title: Appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the One Hundred Seventh Congress.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 322 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 80 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 322.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.J. Res. 80.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Provides for convening the second session of the 107th Congress at noon on January 23, 2002.
